amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to restore a sensible definition of full-time employee for purposes of the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act.

vote.text: Amendment SA 442 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 442 proposed by Senator Collins. (consideration: CR S1969-1970; text: CR S1969) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to restore a sensible definition of full-time employee for purposes of the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 442 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 442 proposed by Senator Collins.
